languages.text: "Иными словами, продемонстрировать оскал там, где не решить вопрос мирной беседой".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Иными словами, продемонстрировать оскал там, где не решить вопрос мирной беседой. Не так ли, госпожа Префект?" {n}Брезгливо поджав губы, старуха отводит взгляд.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "In other words, they are here in case the diplomatic approach fails and you need a show of force instead."
languages.original_text: "Иными словами, продемонстрировать оскал там, где не решить вопрос мирной беседой".

traits.locale_text: "In other words, they are here in case the diplomatic approach fails and you need a show of force."
"In other words, they are here in case the diplomatic approach fails and you need a show of force."
"In other words, they are here in case the diplomatic approach fails and you need a show of force instead."
"In other words, they are here in case the diplomatic approach fails and you need a show of force instead."
"In other words, they are here in case the diplomatic approach fails and you need a show of force instead."
"In other words, they are here in case the diplomatic approach fails and you need a show of force instead."

languages.text: "Mit anderen Worten, sie sind hier, falls der diplomatische Ansatz scheitert und Ihr stattdessen eine Machtdemonstration benötigt."
languages.original_text: "In other words, they are here in case the diplomatic approach fails and you need a show of force instead."

traits.locale_text: "Mit anderen Worten, sie sind hier, falls der diplomatische Ansatz scheitert und Ihr stattdessen eine Machtdemonstration benötigt."

languages.text: « En d'autres termes, ils sont ici afin de vous apporter un soutien militaire au cas où l'approche diplomatique échouerait. »
languages.original_text: "In other words, they are here in case the diplomatic approach fails and you need a show of force instead."

traits.locale_text: « En d'autres termes, ils sont ici afin de vous apporter un soutien militaire au cas où l'approche diplomatique échouerait. »

languages.text: “也就是说，他们之所以在这里，是为了应对谈判失败，需要靠武力解决问题的情况。”
languages.original_text: "In other words, they are here in case the diplomatic approach fails and you need a show of force instead."

traits.locale_text: “也就是说，他们之所以在这里，是为了应对谈判失败，需要靠武力解决问题的情况。”

languages.text: «En otras palabras, están aquí por si la diplomacia falla y necesita hacer una demostración de fuerza».
languages.original_text: "In other words, they are here in case the diplomatic approach fails and you need a show of force instead."

traits.locale_text: «En otras palabras, están aquí por si la diplomacia falla y necesita hacer una demostración de fuerza».

languages.text: 「つまり、彼らは外交的な手段が失敗した場合に備えて、力による威嚇を行うためにここにいるんだ」
languages.original_text: "In other words, they are here in case the diplomatic approach fails and you need a show of force instead."

traits.locale_text: 「つまり、彼らは外交的な手段が失敗した場合に備えて、力による威嚇を行うためにここにいるんだ」

languages.text: "Diğer bir deyişle, diplomatik yaklaşım başarısız olursa ve bunun yerine bir güç gösterisine ihtiyacın olursa diye buradalar."
languages.original_text: "In other words, they are here in case the diplomatic approach fails and you need a show of force instead."

traits.locale_text: "Diğer bir deyişle diplomatik yaklaşım başarısız olursa ve bunun yerine bir güç gösterisine ihtiyacın olursa diye buradalar."
